title: [Bug]: Teams not fully initialized when started minimized
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

I've set in config, that Teams should start minimized. But they are not fully initialized, so I don't get notification until I open the window and Teams fully loads

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start Teams minimized
2. Open the Teams window
3. A "Preparing Teams" message is shown and took some time until workspace is loaded


```

### Expected Behavior

It wold be nice if this could happen automatically on background (if is even possible)

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
